name: Sliding by Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Reinterpreted as a modern style sideboard by Massimo Castagna in 2007, the Sliding sideboard features two smoothly sliding doors, inspired by traditional storage units designed to protect contents and keep items out of view. This minimalist piece stands on two distinctive black nickel-plated steel legs with ample storage space inside, including practical pull-out trays for organized storage. Made from warm-tone North American walnut solid wood and veneered plywood, it is available in two sizes and four sophisticated finish options.
